charges.charge_disposition: 2 years probation with special conditions: perform 200 hours of community service; continue program of drug treatment and testing; enroll in university or technical courses; abide by standard conditions. $50.00 special assessment Amended to correct amount of special assessment to $25.00 (1s)

charges.charge_description: 21:846: Conspiracy to possess w/intent to distribute and to distribute anabolic steroids, a Schedule III controlled substanceand Winstrol, a Schedule III controlled substance. (In violation of 21:841(a)(1) (1)
21:841(a)(1): Possess w/intent to distribute and did distribute anabolic steroids, Decaduraboline, a Schedule III controlled substance and Winstrol, a Schedule III controlled substance (2)
21 USC 846 &; 841(a)(1)-conspiracy to possess with intent to distribute anabolic steroids; possession with intent to distribute anabolic steroids [7:97-m-249]
